home.title: Home
home.description: Hi, I am Julio. I love to create solutions based on HTML, CSS and JavaScript!

me.title: jlozovei
about: Hello, welcome! My name is Julio Lozovei, and I work as a front-end developer.

Born and raised in Curitiba, Brazil, I started to write HTML when was 15 y/o and never stopped since there. Besides writing code, I also write and talk about general technology, development culture and career.
In my spare time I love to play video games, play some music, write about life and create playlists on Spotify (check'em out!).
You can find my texts in those links below:

work.title: Work
work.description: Besides working professionally as a front-end developer and as a freelancer, I love to contribute with open source community. Check below my recent projects:

jobs.tropico: Alongside my friend Daniel Koganas, we developed the Tr√≥pico new website using WordPress, Sass and ES6.

jobs.developer_titles: After some research on GitHub and LinkedIn, I've seen some crazy titles/status and decided to create a kind of generator.
jobs.flavored_markdown: A nice markdown in-browser editor featuring GitHub, Bitbucket, Azure and GitLab markdown styles preview.
jobs.frontend_ended: We've been hearing it for a long time now - and we all know the answer.
